definitions.definition: Expression of worry , fear , shock , surprise , disgust , annoyance , or dismay .
examples: Oh crap! The other driver's going to hit my car!
Aw, crap , I have to start over again from the beginning of the level.

main_definition: ( slang , mildly vulgar ) Expression of worry , fear , shock , surprise , disgust , annoyance , or dismay .
